snippet: Whether selling skillets, cookbooks, lobster or hot dogs, David Venable, QVC’s top food pitchman, is a culinary tower of power. Especially when he does his happy dance.
abstract: David Venable, best-selling cookbook author and host of cooking show on QVC network, has mastered art of marketing culinary equipment and books to suburban, Middle America audience eager for connection; recipe for his summer squash fritters with garlic dipping sauce given.
lead_paragraph: Whether selling skillets, cookbooks, lobster or hot dogs, David Venable, QVC’s top food pitchman, is a culinary tower of power. Especially when he does his happy dance.

headline.main: QVC’s David Venable: The Man Who Helps America Cook
headline.print_headline: The Man Who Helps America Cook
